attributes.action: Police Reforms/Public Pensions - Conflict of Interests
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to request an independent inquiry into the perceived clashes of interest of Tom Winsor, Theresa May & Lord Hutton, surrounding but not limited to the ongoing unindependant reforms of the Police service & changes in the public sector pension schemes, as per following reports:

http://johndehayes.wordpress.com/2012/05/12/independent-review-i-dont-think-so-mr-winsor/

http://www.policeoracle.com/news/Police+Performance/2012/May/22/Tom-Winsor-Has-Applied-To-Become-HMIC-Chief-_48916.html

http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm199899/cmregmem/memil9.htm

http://www.g4s.com/en/Investors/Investor%20Relations%20Information/Major%20Shareholdings/

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-17890248
